subject: Human Growth Hormone
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Steroids
Perjury
lead_paragraph: With Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, on deck to testify, the trial turned into the tale of a mail label from a package of human growth hormone that was supposedly intended for Clemens.
snippet: With Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, on deck to testify, the trial turned into the tale of a mail label from a package of human growth hormone that was supposedly intended for Clemens.
